title: Rick Saccone
added: ===Role in the 2021 storming of the US Capitol===

On January 6, 2021, Saccone took part in the pro-Trump protests outside the US Capitol building. He posted on his Facebook page that "We are storming the capitol. Our vanguard has broken thru the barricades."<ref name="KDKA" />

title: Rick Saccone
added: On January 6, 2021, Saccone took part in the[[2021 United States Capitol protests|pro-Trump protests]]outside the US Capitol building. He posted on his Facebook page that "We are storming the capitol. Our vanguard has broken thru the barricades."<ref name="KDKA" />

title: Rick Saccone
deleted: Footnote 5: Rick Saccone, in this news video, is not near the Capitol and was not "taking part in the 2021 storming of the United States Capitol."
